name: Silver Mouse Dragon
languages: understands Common and Draconic but can’t speak

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The mouse dragon has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the dragon’s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn’t incapacitated.

traits.name: Treasure Sense
traits.desc: The mouse dragon can pinpoint, by scent, the location of precious metals and stones, such as coins and gems, within 60 feet of it.

traits.name: Underfoot
traits.desc: The mouse dragon can attempt to hide even when it is obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than it.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Cold Breath (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales an icy blast in a 10- foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (5d8) cold damage on a failed saving throw, or half as much damage on a successful one.
